name: Colemak
description: The 3rd most popular keyboard layout for touch typing in English.

name: Colemak-DH
description: Colemak Mod-DH introduces a minor modification to the Colemak keyboard layout, designed to make typing more comfortable.

name: Capewell-QWERF 2007
description: Similar to the QWERTY layout, but with improvements.

name: Capewell-QWERF 2006
description: Similar to the QWERTY layout, but with improvements.

name: Capewell-Dvorak
description: Puts ZXCV in their QWERTY positions; fixes some 'mistakes' in Dvorak.

name: Dvorak
description: The second most popular keyboard layout.
